history.message:
Hi Anastasia,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Anastasia,

Wonderful piece. We'd love to have this published in The Decadent Review.


We'll contact you via email (as registered on Submittable - sometimes those end up in the junk folder, just heads up).


Thank you, and health above all, yours,


D.

Dear Anastasia Michopoulou,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review

Hello! 

That is great news. Thank you! 

I look forward to it.


Best regards, 

Anastasia
